name: collect-service-endpoints
description: Collect service endpoints for the application.

parameters.usage: Specify the name of the application
parameters.name: name

parameters.usage: Specify the namespace of the application
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.usage: Filter the component of the endpoints
parameters.name: components

parameters.usage: Filter the port of the endpoints
parameters.name: port

parameters.usage: Filter the port name of the endpoints
parameters.name: portName

parameters.usage: Filter the endpoint that are only outer
parameters.name: outer
